item.text: Interaction design is heavily focused on satisfying the needs and desires of the majority of people who will use the product; other disciplines like [[software engineering]] have a heavy focus on designing for technical stakeholders of a project.

story.text: Interaction design is heavily focused on satisfying the needs and desires of the majority of people who will use the product; other disciplines like [[software engineering]] have a heavy focus on designing for technical stakeholders of a project.
